review: Dropped cable, went to slingtv @$20 per month but samsung does not have sling app so I paid for 3 months of sling and got free fire stick which does have the sling app. Has all the cable stations my wife and I usually watched. Fire stick works great and I love its integration with Amazon.works perfect for all our needs. Clear menus and fast response on my samsung 4K tv. Great product for what it does.
